title: Egypt joins China’s ILRS moon base initiative
summary: Egypt and China signed a series of space agreements Wednesday including cooperation on the China-led International Lunar Research Station.

title: DARPA picks 14 companies for lunar architecture study
summary: DARPA has selected 14 companies, ranging from small startups to established aerospace corporations, to participate in a study on developing commercial lunar infrastructure.

title: UAG Endorses Single Agency for Mission Authorization
summary: The White House National Space Council’s Users’ Advisory Group is recommending that a single agency be designated to oversee the regulation of novel space activities, the so-called “mission authorization” function. […]

title: Coming Soon... I.S.S
summary: I.S.S explores the hypothetical scenario of the ISS becoming a battleground as Earth faces nuclear obliteration.

title: NASA Psyche Captures First Light Images
summary: NASA's Psyche spacecraft has marked a significant milestone on its journey to explore the asteroid Psyche in the main asteroid belt between Mars and Jupite by turning on its twin cameras, and capturing the spacecraft's "first light" images.
